content:
Is there a way to write out a bors command but not actually invoke it? I recall putting it into a code block used to work, like you could say something along the lines of (note the inline code block)

You can approve the PR with @bors r=foo

but doing it today made bors think I r+d the PR anyway.
I don't think so, triagebot does handle code blocks and quotes but I don't think bors does
